newsitem.title: CHINA: YUGANG RAISES HK$545 MLN IN SHARE ISSUE.
newsitem.headline: YUGANG RAISES HK$545 MLN IN SHARE ISSUE.

text.p: Yugang International Ltd said on Monday it had agreed to issue 417.5 million new shares to its controlling shareholder Chongqing Industrial Ltd at HK$1.32 per share, raising net proceeds of about HK$545 million.

Chongqing Industrial has also agreed to place about 206.3 million existing Yugang shares, or 9.7 percent of Yugang International's existing issued share capital, to independent investors at HK$1.32 per share.
Yugang International said it would use about HK$336.4 million of the net proceeds to finance property investments in Chongqing City in China and the balance for working capital.
Chongqing Industrial will maintain a 50.6 percent stake in Yugang International after the transactions.
Trading in Yugang International shares was suspended last Thursday and was due to resume on Monday.
The stock last traded at HK$1.81.
